languages.text: "Вот нам талдычат — ксеносы то, ксеносы это... а я смотрю на тебя, Ирлиэт, и ты будто бы и на человека похожа. Только тощая больно".
"People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."
languages.original_text: "Вот нам талдычат — ксеносы то, ксеносы это... а я смотрю на тебя, Ирлиэт, и ты будто бы и на человека похожа. Только тощая больно".

traits.locale_text: "People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."
"People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."
"People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."
"People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."

languages.text: “人们总是说异形这个，异形那个的……可看着你，伊莉耶特，我只能说你很像人类，只是瘦得皮包骨头了。”
languages.original_text: "People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."

traits.locale_text: “人们总是说异形这个，异形那个的……可看着你，伊莉耶特，我只能说你很像人类，只是瘦得皮包骨头了。”

languages.text: « Les gens font que de se plaindre des xénos... mais quand je vous regarde, Yrliet, je trouve que vous ressemblez à une humaine. À une humaine un peu trop squelettique, certes, mais à une humaine quand même. »
languages.original_text: "People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."

traits.locale_text: « Les gens font que de se plaindre des xénos... mais quand je vous regarde, Yrliet, je trouve que vous ressemblez à une humaine. À une humaine un peu trop squelettique, certes, mais à une humaine quand même. »

languages.text: "Ständig hört man Xenos hier, Xenos da ... Doch wenn ich Euch ansehe, Yrliet, seht Ihr aus wie ein Mensch. Wenn auch ein beunruhigend dünner Mensch."
languages.original_text: "People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."

traits.locale_text: "Ständig hört man Xenos hier, Xenos da ... Doch wenn ich Euch ansehe, Yrliet, seht Ihr aus wie ein Mensch. Wenn auch ein beunruhigend dünner Mensch."

languages.text: 「みんな異種族についてなんだか色々話すけど…あなたはどうなの、ユリエット。あなた、危険なほど痩せてるけど、まるで人間じゃない」
languages.original_text: "People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."

traits.locale_text: 「みんな異種族についてなんだか色々話すけど…あなたはどうなの、ユリエット。あなた、危険なほど痩せてるけど、まるで人間じゃない」

languages.text: «La gente está venga a hablar de que si los xenos esto, si los xenos aquello... pero cuando te miro, Yrliet, pienso que pareces humana, aunque peligrosamente delgada».
languages.original_text: "People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."

traits.locale_text: «La gente está venga a hablar de que si los xenos esto, si los xenos aquello... pero cuando te miro, Yrliet, pienso que pareces humana, aunque peligrosamente delgada».

languages.original_text: "People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."

languages.text: "İnsanlar zenolar şöyle zenolar böyle diye atıp tutuyor. Lakin sana bakınca hastalıklı düzeyde sıska da olsa insan gibi olduğunu görüyorum Yrliet."
languages.original_text: "People go on and on about xenos this and xenos that... but I look at you, Yrliet, and I think you look like a human, albeit a dangerously skinny one."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlar zenolar şöyle zenolar böyle diye atıp tutuyor. Lakin sana bakınca hastalıklı düzeyde sıska da olsa insan gibi olduğunu görüyorum Yrliet."
